name: Vegan Protein Shake
description: This 4-ingredient Vegan Protein Shake is made with vegan protein powder, banana, soy milk, and peanut butter. Itâ€™s an easy to customize breakfast that will keep you full for hours!

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. If it's not thick or cold enough, add a few more ice cubes and blend again.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth and creamy. If it's not thick or cold enough, add a few more ice cubes and blend again.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a cup and enjoy. Sometimes I top it with a little vegan whipped cream and mini chocolate chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a cup and enjoy. Sometimes I top it with a little vegan whipped cream and mini chocolate chips.
